'''Torch Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Torch Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Torch Wood can be found around the arena for the [[Emperor of Fire and Iron]] boss and in {{LL|"A Very Bright Place"|.}}

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=525 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
